article: the international warcrimes tribunal for the former yugoslavia has postponed until march ## the opening of the trial of three moslems and a croat accused over the murder and torture of serb prisoners at unk camp in central bosnia , it was announced here friday .
abstract: warcrimes tribunal defers trial of unk four
